message.content:
cs.HC, cs.GR, cs.GT, cs.SI, cs.CV 

The paper proposes a new genre of digital games that combines live-action, mixed-reality, context-awareness, and interaction paradigms. The focus is on the human-computer interaction aspect, which suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) category. The paper also discusses the use of physical objects and architectural elements, which could fall under the Graphics (cs.GR) category. The concept of emergent gameplay could be related to Game Theory (cs.GT) and Social and Information Networks (cs.SI). Finally, the use of HMD devices and the mapping of physical objects to virtual elements could be related to Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV).
